properties.areaDesc: Marion, TN; Sequatchie, TN; Bledsoe, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:38AM EST until February 12 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe...Marion and
Sequatchie Counties

Rain will return to the area for the next few days, and rainfall
amounts of two to three inches may fall in the river basins through
Wednesday morning.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN.
* From Tuesday afternoon until Wednesday evening.
* At 09:15 AM Monday the stage was 9.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Tuesday early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 14.5 feet by early Wednesday morning. The
river will fall below flood stage by Wednesday afternoon.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of agricultural land begins.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
